response.overview: After a suicidal spell destroys their home world, three legendary wizards — Balthazar the Blue, Fasgrin the Green, and Radovan the Red — escape to Earth. Stripped of their status and limited in magical power, the trio faces a new challenge: navigating modern life. From failing at odd jobs to accidentally committing crimes, their attempts to blend in only make things worse. Just when all hope seems lost, a random act of kindness restores their spirits... only for them to immediately blow it on alcohol and junk food. What follows is a chaotic series of misadventures, culminating in their arrest and a hilariously awkward jailbreak. With no clue how to thrive on Earth, they have only one thing keeping them going — each other... sort of.
response.tagline: Three wizards. One world. Zero Clue.
response.title: Wizards
